abstract: A study intended to address critiques of climate science by skeptics confirmed that "global warming is real" and the world's average  land temperature has risen since the mid-1950, but critics were not satisfied.
snippet: A study intended to address critiques of climate science by skeptics confirmed that "global warming is real" and the world's average  land temperature has risen since the mid-1950, but critics were not satisfied.

headline.main: Climate Study Does Not Placate Skeptics
